name: Carcassonne
description: A tile-laying game where players build a medieval landscape and score points for completing features.

name: Catan
description: A classic game of resource management and trading on a hexagonal board.

name: Ticket to Ride
description: A cross-country train adventure where players collect sets of colored train cars to claim railway routes connecting cities.

name: 7 Wonders
description: A card drafting game where players lead an ancient civilization to prosperity through three ages of development.

name: Scythe
description: An engine-building game set in an alternate-history 1920s Eastern Europe where players lead factions vying for control.

name: Terraforming Mars
description: A game of resource management and card drafting where players compete to make Mars habitable.

name: Agricola
description: A worker placement game where players manage a farm growing crops, raising animals, and expanding their family.

name: Castles of Burgundy
description: A dice-rolling and tile-laying game where players develop their estates and trade goods.

name: Puerto Rico
description: A classic Eurogame where players take on roles in a colonial Caribbean economy, shipping goods and developing their plantations.

name: The Castles of Tuscany
description: A dice-rolling and tile-laying game where players build castles and landscapes in Renaissance Italy.

name: Codenames
description: A word association game where two teams compete to identify their secret agents.

name: The Resistance
description: A social deduction game where players are either members of the Resistance or Imperial spies trying to sabotage missions.

name: Tokaido
description: A worker placement game where players journey along the East Sea Road in Japan, collecting souvenirs and experiencing encounters.

name: Dixit
description: A storytelling game where players use cards with dreamlike illustrations to create imaginative narratives.

name: Pandemic Legacy: Season 1
description: A cooperative campaign game where players fight to cure diseases and prevent outbreaks with the game's story evolving over multiple sessions.

name: Forbidden Island
description: A cooperative game where players race to collect treasures from a sinking island before it's too late.

name: Hanabi
description: A cooperative card game where players hold their cards facing away from them and try to play them in the correct order.

name: Dominion
description: A deck-building game where players start with a basic deck of cards and acquire new, more powerful cards throughout the game.

name: Star Realms
description: A fast-paced space-themed deck-building game for two players.
